title: Whats the font used on this Kanye West album cover?
content:
[http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/4/41/808nheartbreakkover.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312204044/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/4/41/808nheartbreakkover.jpg "http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/4/41/808nheartbreakkover.jpg")

Could anybody please identify it?  
Free alternatives would also be nice!
author: Music.Producer

comments.content: I'd say it is Engravers.. the ampersand is different from that of Blair or Sackers Gothic
